TOUCHSTONE INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

  # Create a folder that will be your Touchstone workspace (e.g. `touchstone-workspace`)
  # Install the design platform: download the archive and and unzip it in your Touchstone workspace.
  # Install the run platform: download the archive and unzip it in your Touchstone workspace. Then go in the run folder and type the command: `./build.sh all` or (`.\build.bat all` for Windows users).
